blogPost.excerpt:
One constant refrain during the build to UFC 257 and the rematch between Dustin Poirier and Conor McGregor was that Poirier was not the same man he was when McGregor knocked him out in their 2014 featherweight meeting. Poirier proved that to be true in the rematch on Fight Island when he survived early blitzes from McGregor to score a shocking upset victory by second-round knockout.

McGregor came out fast, flashing his trademark speed and power, and even dipping back into the same shoulder strikes that led to the knockout of Donald Cerrone in his January 2020 return to the Octagon. Through it all, Poirier remained steady, working over McGregor with leg kicks, eventually taking the base of the Irish superstar before blitzing him with punches, dropping him to the canvas and scoring the knockout at the 2:32 mark of Round 2.

SUBSCRIBE TO OUR CHANNEL:
https://www.youtube.com/user/CBSSportsHQ
 
FOLLOW US ON:
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/CBSSports/
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/cbssports/
Twitter - https://twitter.com/CBSSports

#UFC #McGregor #Poirier #ConorMcGregor #DustinPoirier #UFC257 #MMA
blogPost.body:
One constant refrain during the build to UFC 257 and the rematch between Dustin Poirier and Conor McGregor was that Poirier was not the same man he was when McGregor knocked him out in their 2014 featherweight meeting. Poirier proved that to be true in the rematch on Fight Island when he survived early blitzes from McGregor to score a shocking upset victory by second-round knockout.

McGregor came out fast, flashing his trademark speed and power, and even dipping back into the same shoulder strikes that led to the knockout of Donald Cerrone in his January 2020 return to the Octagon. Through it all, Poirier remained steady, working over McGregor with leg kicks, eventually taking the base of the Irish superstar before blitzing him with punches, dropping him to the canvas and scoring the knockout at the 2:32 mark of Round 2.

localize.title: 康纳-麦格雷戈（Conor McGregor）VS达斯汀-波利尔（Dustin Poirier）。UFC 257 - CBS Sports HQ
localize.description:
在UFC 257和达斯汀-波里耶和康纳-麦格雷戈之间的复赛的建设过程中，一个持续的说法是，波里耶已经不是2014年麦格雷戈在他们的羽量级会议上将他击倒时的那个人了。Poirier在格斗岛的复赛中证明了这一点，他在麦格雷戈的早期突击中幸存下来，以第二回合击倒的方式取得了令人震惊的胜利。

麦格雷戈出场速度很快，闪现出他标志性的速度和力量，甚至浸回了同样的肩击，这导致了他在2020年1月重返八角笼时击倒唐纳德-塞隆。在这一切中，Poirier仍然保持稳定，用腿部踢打麦格雷戈，最终在第二回合2:32分时，用拳头猛击这位爱尔兰巨星的底部，将他摔倒在帆布上，并将其击倒。

订阅我们的频道。
https://www.youtube.com/user/CBSSportsHQ
 
跟随我们。
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/CBSSports/
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/cbssports/
Twitter - https://twitter.com/CBSSports

#UFC #McGregor #Poirier #ConorMcGregor #DustinPoirier #UFC257 #MMA

localize.title: 康納-麥格雷戈（Conor McGregor）VS達斯汀-波利爾（Dustin Poirier）。UFC 257 - CBS Sports HQ
localize.description:
在UFC 257和達斯汀-波里耶和康納-麥格雷戈之間的複賽的建設過程中，一個持續的說法是，波里耶已經不是2014年麥格雷戈在他們的羽量級會議上將他擊倒時的那個人了。Poirier在格鬥島的複賽中證明了這一點，他在麥格雷戈的早期突擊中倖存下來，以第二回合擊倒的方式取得了令人震驚的勝利。

麥格雷戈出場速度很快，閃現出他標誌性的速度和力量，甚至浸回了同樣的肩擊，這導致了他在2020年1月重返八角籠時擊倒唐納德-塞隆。在這一切中，Poirier仍然保持穩定，用腿部踢打麥格雷戈，最終在第二回合2:32分時，用拳頭猛擊這位愛爾蘭巨星的底部，將他摔倒在帆布上，並將其擊倒。

訂閱我們的頻道。
https://www.youtube.com/user/CBSSportsHQ
 
跟隨我們。
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/CBSSports/
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/cbssports/
Twitter - https://twitter.com/CBSSports

#UFC #McGregor #Poirier #ConorMcGregor #DustinPoirier #UFC257 #MMA

Conor McGregor was knocked out by Dustin Poirier at UFC 257 after a flurry of brutal leg kicks caused McGregor's leg to go dead and weak. Poirier ultimately won by knockout to defeat McGregor, but the leg kicks were really the star of the show to help give Poirier the victory. In this video we'll review the leg kicks and explain the anatomy that makes them so effective in MMA!

EDIT 4:45, these are NOT dermatomes. Dermatomes come from the spinal nerve root levels, these are just the distributions from sensory peripheral nerves.

next.excerpt:
SpaceX is targeting Sunday, January 24 for launch of Transporter-1, SpaceX’s first dedicated SmallSat Rideshare Program mission, from Space Launch Complex 40 (SLC-40) at Cape Canaveral Space Force Station in Florida. The 22-minute launch window opens at 10:00 a.m. EST, or 15:00 UTC.
 
Falcon 9’s first stage booster previously supported launch of Crew Dragon’s second demonstration mission, the ANASIS-II mission, a Starlink mission, and launch of Dragon’s 21st cargo resupply mission to the International Space Station. Following stage separation, SpaceX will land Falcon 9’s first stage on the Of Course I Still Love You droneship, which will be stationed in the Atlantic Ocean. 

On board this launch are 133 commercial and government spacecraft (including CubeSats, microsats, and orbital transfer vehicles) and 10 Starlink satellites – the most spacecraft ever deployed on a single mission. The Starlink satellites aboard this mission will be the first in the constellation to deploy to a polar orbit.
next.title: Transporter-1 Mission

localize.title: Transporter-1任务
localize.description:
SpaceX公司的目标是1月24日（周日）从佛罗里达州卡纳维拉尔角空间力量站的40号空间发射场（SLC-40）发射Transporter-1，这是SpaceX公司第一个专门的小卫星乘车计划任务。22分钟的发射窗口在美国东部时间上午10:00，或世界协调时15:00开启。
 
猎鹰9号的第一级助推器此前曾支持发射乘龙号的第二次演示任务、ANASIS-II任务、Starlink任务，以及发射乘龙号前往国际空间站的第21次货物补给任务。在级分离之后，SpaceX将把猎鹰9号的第一级降落在Of Course I Still Love You无人飞船上，该飞船将驻扎在大西洋。

此次发射搭载的是133个商业和政府航天器（包括CubeSats、微型卫星和轨道转移飞行器）和10颗Starlink卫星--这是有史以来在一次任务中部署最多的航天器。这次飞行任务所搭载的星联卫星将是该星座中第一个部署到极地轨道的卫星。

localize.title: Transporter-1任務
localize.description:
SpaceX公司的目標是1月24日（週日）從佛羅里達州卡納維拉爾角空間力量站的40號空間發射場（SLC-40）發射Transporter-1，這是SpaceX公司第一個專門的小衛星乘車計劃任務。22分鐘的發射窗口在美國東部時間上午10:00，或世界協調時15:00開啓。
 
獵鷹9號的第一級助推器此前曾支持發射乘龍號的第二次演示任務、ANASIS-II任務、Starlink任務，以及發射乘龍號前往國際空間站的第21次貨物補給任務。在級分離之後，SpaceX將把獵鷹9號的第一級降落在Of Course I Still Love You無人飛船上，該飛船將駐紮在大西洋。

此次發射搭載的是133個商業和政府航天器（包括CubeSats、微型衛星和軌道轉移飛行器）和10顆Starlink衛星--這是有史以來在一次任務中部署最多的航天器。這次飛行任務所搭載的星聯衛星將是該星座中第一個部署到極地軌道的衛星。
